title: League of Legends does not work on MacBook Pro?
body: I have not been able to play league for months. Everything in client works fine, but when I am in loading screen, my entire computer just becomes a gray screen and stays like that until I shut down or restart my computer. Wondering what is going on?

replies.body:
That gray screen almost sounds like it's the usual "program not responding" issue that can randomly happen sometimes. Usually, it means something is going wrong with the files associated with the program. In this case, I would first try running a quick repair and testing that in a custom/practice game first. 

If that doesn't help at all, I would also check through the steps on the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) since losing your connection momentarily on the loading screen can sometimes cause it to crash entirely.
